prompt:
Patient: Hello?

Nurse: Hi, this is Rachel calling from O'Connor Hospital. I'm an AI on a recorded line. Is this Abner Shyam?

Patient: Yes. That's me.

Nurse: Great, Mr. Shyam. I'm calling on behalf of your primary care doctor, Doctor Maria Rodriguez. I hope you're doing well. How are you feeling now that you're back home from the hospital?

Patient: I'm doing alright. Thanks.

responses.gpt4: That's good to hear, Mr. Shyam. It must be so nice to be back at home, it's always comforting to be in our own space. Is there something you've been looking forward to doing now that you're back home?
responses.our_model: I'm glad to hear that, Mr. Shyam. It must be a relief to be back in your own space. Is there anything in particular you're looking forward to doing now that you're home?
